definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: (Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 84) foundation, stay (of society) (√ [[שׁית]] Thes Kö:ii. l. 172);—pl. [[הַשָּׁתוֹת יֵהָרֵסָוּן]] Ps 11:3 (prob. fig. of established usages, laws, etc., Vulgate leges, Sym. qesmoi/, so Hup-Now Bae Che(1888) al.; > Thes al. of nobles); Thes puts here also [[שָֽׁתׂתֶ֫יהָ]] Is 19:10 (so MT probably intends), which Ew Di Kit then interpret of working-classes, ‖[[עשֵׁׂי שֶׂכֶר]]; but perh. opp. of this, the upper classes, so as to include all ranks of society, Thes De Che:Comm.; Che:Hpt Buhl al. [[שׁׂתֶיהָ]] weavers of it (cf. Du Marti), v. III. [[שׁתה]]. p. 1059
